movie.title: Verliefd op Ibiza
movie.writer: Tijs van Marle, Anne-Louise Verboon, Maarten Lebens, Hilda van der Meulen (developed by), Dick Bouquet (additional material)
movie.actors: Willeke van Ammelrooy, Jim Bakkum, Rick Engelkes, Kim Feenstra
movie.plot: A vacation to Ibiza with a lot of parties. A part of a family lives on the island and the rest is visiting and that causes a lot of drama.
